name: CatWiki
intro: Get to know more about your cat breed.

title: About the project
paragraph: This project uses TheCatAPI and displays the data. Request is made using fetch API inside Next.js getStaticProps function, index.js and breeds.js pages are generated in this way while each cat breed page is generated on a server-side with Next.js getServerSideProps function. For styling i was using CSS Modules with support for SCSS.

name: Digital menu
description: Fast loading digital menu with for your store with an offline support, easily installable on your device and with the support for multiple languages.
